data.neighbors.hubness

Class KNeighborEntropyExplorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.neighbors.hubness.KNeighborEntropyExplorer

  • public class KNeighborEntropyExplorer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the methods for calculating the entropy of kNN sets and reverse kNN sets. This kNN set (non)-homogeneity can be used to quantify the semantic inconsistencies under the assumption of hubness in intrinsically high-dimensional data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KNeighborEntropyExplorer(NeighborSetFinder nsf, int numClasses)
      Initialization.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateAllKNNEntropyStats()
      This method calculates the stats of both direct and reverse kNN entropy distributions for a range of k-values, as implicitly defined by the provided NeighborSetFinder object.
      void calculateDirectEntropyStats()
      This method calculates the stats of the kNN entropy distribution for a range of k-values, as implicitly defined by the provided NeighborSetFinder object.
      void calculateRNNEntropyStats()
      This method calculates the stats of the reverse kNN entropy distribution for a range of k-values, as implicitly defined by the provided NeighborSetFinder object.
      float[] getAverageDirectAndReverseEntropyDifs()
      This method computes the average difference between the direct and reverse neighbor set entropies over a range of neighborhood sizes.
      float[] getDirectEntropyKurtosisVals() 
      float[] getDirectEntropyMeans() 
      float[] getDirectEntropySkews() 
      float[] getDirectEntropyStDevs() 
      float[] getReverseEntropyKurtosisVals() 
      float[] getReverseEntropyMeans() 
      float[] getReverseEntropySkews() 
      float[] getReverseEntropyStDevs()

        public KNeighborEntropyExplorer(NeighborSetFinder nsf,

        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        nsf - NeighborSetFinder object that holds the pre-computed kNN sets.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.

        Returns:

      • getAverageDirectAndReverseEntropyDifs

        public float[] getAverageDirectAndReverseEntropyDifs()
        This method computes the average difference between the direct and reverse neighbor set entropies over a range of neighborhood sizes.
        Returns:
        float[] that is the array of differences between the direct and reverse kNN entropies, over a range of neighborhood sizes.

      • calculateDirectEntropyStats

        public void calculateDirectEntropyStats()
        This method calculates the stats of the kNN entropy distribution for a range of k-values, as implicitly defined by the provided NeighborSetFinder object.

        public void calculateRNNEntropyStats()
